quote: To sell your soul is the easiest thing in the world. That's what everybody does every hour of his life. If I asked you to keep your soul - would you understand why that's much harder?
quote_letters: TO SELL YOUR SOUL IS THE EASIEST THING IN THE WORLD THATS WHAT EVERYBODY DOES EVERY HOUR OF HIS LIFE IF I ASKED YOU TO KEEP YOUR SOUL - WOULD YOU UNDERSTAND WHY THATS MUCH HARDER
